item.title: Promising Phase 2 Results for New Salmonella Vaccine
item.description: Salmonella serovar Paratyphi A vaccine offers protection against infection and is well tolerated in healthy adults. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Already Lost Some Weight? Tirzepatide May Assist Further
